title: Mercury in Aries
summary: A mental climate that favors speed and directness. Ideas arrive quickly and the urge to decide follows fast. The opportunity is crisp action supported by clear words, without sacrificing listening.

meaning.headline: Thinking moves fast and wants a target.

frames.text: Mercury in Aries emphasizes rapid decisions, blunt speech, and initiative in conversation.
Directness can clear the air, especially when paired with a willingness to adjust if new information appears.
Momentum builds when a clear challenge or problem is identified.
Short bursts of focus work better than slow, meandering discussion.
Speed guarantees accuracy or gives permission to ignore others.

frictions: Assuming agreement because you spoke first
Arguments sparked by tone rather than content
Burnout from sprinting through mental tasks
opportunities: Making a decision that has lingered
Starting a project that needs courage to begin

do: Lead with a headline, then invite response.
Use timers or sprints for focused work.
Check consent before accelerating a conversation.
Write decisions down to avoid rehashing them.
Move your body to discharge mental restlessness.
avoid: Taking on too many urgent tasks at once
Forgetting to loop in slower processors

reusable_lines.text: Quick thinking is available-aim it before you fire.
Direct words land best when paired with a moment to listen.

forbidden_claims: Guarantees of success from bold speech
Claims that fast thinking is superior
allowed_framing: Process language: can energize decisions and candid dialogue
Agency-forward framing: you choose when to speed up or pause
Contextual framing: clarity improves when tempo matches the task

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
